Abstract:
The MOD16A2 Version 6 Evapotranspiration/Latent Heat Flux product is an 8-day composite product produced at 500 meter pixel resolution. The algorithm used for the MOD16 data product collection is based on the logic of the Penman-Monteith equation, which includes inputs of daily meteorological reanalysis data along with MODIS remotely sensed data products such as vegetation property dynamics, albedo, and land cover.

Provided in the MOD16A2 product are layers for composited Evapotranspiration (ET), Latent Heat Flux (LE), Potential ET (PET) and Potential LE (PLE) along with a quality control layer. Two low resolution browse images are also available for each MOD16A2 granule, (1) ET and (2) LE.

The pixel values for the two Evapotranspiration layers (ET & PET) are the sum of all eight days within the composite period and the pixel values for the two Latent Heat layers (LE & PLE) are the average of all eight days within the composite period. Note that the last 8-day period of each year is a 5 or 6-day composite period, depending on the year.

Improvements/Changes from Previous Versions

Spatial resolution of Version 6 products increased to nominal 500 meters from nominal 1,000 meters in Version 5.

Version 5 data products were previously distributed by the Numerical Terradynamic Simulation Group at the University of Montana. The Version 6 products are a continuation of this project.

Operational Version 6 data products have had additional cloud/aerosol screening applied for the end of the year in which the previous full year of MODIS Leaf Area Index/FPAR (MOD15A2H) and Albedo (MCD43A3) data are available. See Section 3.2.1 of the User Guide for more information.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: NDAYS_COMPOSITED
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of days of the data that have been composited.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODPSN
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good Net Photosynthesis (PSN) quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODNPP
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good Net Primary Production (NPP) quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

EntryTitle: MODIS/Terra Net Evapotranspiration 8-Day L4 Global 500m SIN Grid V006

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)
